title: Breakingviews TV: Legere-demain
text:
Breakingviews TV: Legere-demain 1:20pm EDT - 03:59
Jennifer Saba tells Richard Beales why T-Mobile US’s $26 bln deal to buy rival cellphone carrier Sprint is cleverly pitched to appeal to Donald Trump’s administration and discusses the evidence that Sprint owner SoftBank was desperate to sell. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Jennifer Saba tells Richard Beales why T-Mobile US’s $26 bln deal to buy rival cellphone carrier Sprint is cleverly pitched to appeal to Donald Trump’s administration and discusses the evidence that Sprint owner SoftBank was desperate to sell.
